title: Curious George Makes Pancakes
description: Every year George and the Man with the Yellow Hat attend the pancake breakfast to benefit the childrenâ€™s hospital. Always curious, George finds his way to the pancake table. After making some of the most interesting pancakes the crowd has ever seen, George gets into even more monkey mischief. Activities include coloring, fun facts, and funny faces pancake recipe.
author: Margret Rey
